publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2318.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2005—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2318) in the name of Mr Tom McCabe, insert at end “but, in so doing, considers that any consequential funding under the Barnett Formula accruing to Scotland as a result of an increase in the grant given to English and Welsh local authorities should be allocated to the Scottish Local Authorities’ Revenue Support Grant.” Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
